channel.title: Comments on: Pushing Silverlight for my Company
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: How many developers were in your team? Did they have any previous experience of Silverlight?
item.content:encoded: How many developers were in your team? Did they have any previous experience of Silverlight?

item.title: By: ThatRickGuy
item.dc:creator: ThatRickGuy
item.content:encoded:
I’m hoping to get more details out over the next week or so. Just jumping from one hot project to the next right now, managed to finish this first over view of the project while waiting on some new web services to get wrapped up for my next project.

-Rick

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.content:encoded:
Great story, thanks, but can you be a bit more specific programming wise.

I am going to learn Silverlight and these stories are quite inspiring.
